Tue, Jul 21, 2015, 21:37 BST - UK Markets closed Microsoft Posts $3.2bn Loss In Second Quarter By (c) Sky News 2015 | Sky News – 4 minutes 38 seconds ago View Photo 

Microsoft (NasdaqGS: MSFT - news ) has announced a net loss of $3.2bn (£2.1bn), following a substantial writedown on the value of its smartphone business.
